titleStmt.title: A persvvasion to the English recusants, to reconcile themselues to the Church of England Written for the better satisfaction of those which be ignorant. By Iohn Doue Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Dove, John, 1560 or 61-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: By V[alentine] S[immes] for Cuthbert Burby dvvelling in Paules church-yard at the signe of the Swanne,

notesStmt.note: British Library copy identified as STC 7084 on UMI microfilm reel 1234.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 1234 (British Library copy) and at reel 1446 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
